description: OTWU files replaced .OTW files, which were used to save workbook templates in Origin before the 2018 version. OTWU files are saved in a unicode format that features performance advantages over the older OTW file format.
You can only open OTWU files with Origin, which can be used to create, open, and edit OTWU files. The program is only available for Windows.
To open an OTWU file in Origin, select File â†’ Open... , select the "Origin Template .otwu" file type, navigate to the OTWU file location, and click Open .
